```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- read_xlsx("./3.xlsx", sheet="Table S1 Age", skip=1)
colnames(df) <- tolower(colnames(df))
colnames(df) <- gsub(" ", "_", colnames(df))
mac <- df %>% group_by(mechanism_of_death) %>% summarise(sum(smoothed_suicide_count))
```
